text: geudaeneun malhala : ‘geudaedeul-i geudaedeul ma-eum sog-e issneun geos-eul sumgigeona deuleonaenda hadeolado hananimkkeseoneun geugeos-eul algo gyesinola. geuligo geubunkkeseoneun haneul-e issneun geosgwa daejie issneun geos-eul algo gyesinola. hananimkkeseoneun modeun geos-i ganeunghan bun-isila.’
